document.description: ★★★★★Eat at Slim a few times. Food was great, no problems. ... if i ask for a slight modification to my order ... slim is a fast food restaurant. close to disney ...
document.body:

12913 Restaurants | 3831 Markets | 206 Products | 55784 Reviews﻿ ﻿View in Deutsche | English | Español | Français ﻿Thursday, July 12, 2012 | 23 Shaaban 1433
HOME→ United States → Florida → Orlando Metro
Slim Orlando's Phillysteak&Gyro 11985 South Apopka Vineland Road, Orlando, FL 32836 74% will return
4.3 /5.0 124 reviews
All zabihah halal food served. Gyro, chicken gyro, Philly steak, Philly chicken, shawarma, kabobs, kofta, boneless wings, and more. Last orders served at 1:30 am. Closes at 2 am. Close to Walt Disney World Resort. Every Sunday gyro is $4.99. Every Monday&Wednesday 6pc Boneless wings is $2.99. Every Tuesday&Thursday hamburgers are $2.99. Every day half pound chicken kabob, hummus, salad, rice&pita is $8.99. All Halal foods. Added on May 27, 2005 and last updated 1 year ago
